jrlCIRdynamicsJRLJapan::Body

jrlCIRdynamicsJRLJapan::Body Class Reference

Collaboration diagram for jrlCIRdynamicsJRLJapan::Body:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This object is used to compute the Center Of Masse, and store some basic information of each body of the robot.


Physical parameters of the body.

int label
 Label.
double masse
 Mass.
 MAL_S3_VECTOR (posCoM, double)
 Position of the Center of Mass.
 MAL_S3x3_MATRIX (inertie, double)
 Inertia Matrix.
